import fileinput as f

for line in f.input():
    if f.lineno() == 1:
        [n] = map(int, line.split())
        data = []
    else:
        data.append(map(int, line.split()))

    
for i in range(n):
    candles = map(int, data[i])
    min_candles = min(candles[1:])
    min_ind = candles[1:].index(min_candles) + 1
    
    if min_candles > candles[0]:
        print '1' + '0' * (candles[0] + 1)
    else:
        print str(min_ind) * (min_candles + 1)
